channel.title: Comments on: Here Is Why Your Business Is Tagged “Inactive” On The CAC Registry
channel.description: Web Ã— Design; Branditechture is an hybrid creative design agency.

item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://branditechture.agency/here-is-why-your-business-is-tagged-inactive-on-the-cac-registry/#comment-1375">Giant Bulls Nigeria Limited</a>.
You are right. Luckily there is a solution.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Giant Bulls Nigeria Limited.

You are right. Luckily there is a solution.

item.title: By: Giant Bulls Nigeria Limited
item.dc:creator: Giant Bulls Nigeria Limited
item.description: It's unfortunate am on aware of the annual submit since I register the company in 2012. I think the CAC should do more in enlighten the general public the need of annual submit. Its me Suleiman Mohammed
item.content:encoded:
It’s unfortunate am on aware of the annual submit since I register the company in 2012.
I think the CAC should do more in enlighten the general public the need of annual submit.
Its me
Suleiman Mohammed

item.title: By: Yusuf Odukoya
item.dc:creator: Yusuf Odukoya
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://branditechture.agency/here-is-why-your-business-is-tagged-inactive-on-the-cac-registry/#comment-929">AKINWALE BEKA AND COMPANY</a>.
I will advise you to show up there personally with some documents to support your claim. To reiterate, this is not a case you can settle online. Show up at the office or send a representative (with supporting documents) if you are currently out of town.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to AKINWALE BEKA AND COMPANY.

I will advise you to show up there personally with some documents to support your claim. To reiterate, this is not a case you can settle online. Show up at the office or send a representative (with supporting documents) if you are currently out of town.

item.title: By: AKINWALE BEKA AND COMPANY
item.dc:creator: AKINWALE BEKA AND COMPANY
item.description: I ALWAYS FILE MY ANNUAL RETURN SINCE MY BUSINESS NAME WAS REGISTERED BY C A C IN 1990. BUT IN 2021 WHEN CAC DIRECTS ANNUAL RETURN FILING TO BE ONLINE, I HAVE NOT BEEN ABLE TO FILE BECAUSE MY BUSINESS NAME DID NOT SHOW ON CAC PORTAL. I SENT EMAIL THREE TIMES WITH A COPY OF CAC RECEIPT OF ANNUAL RETURN YET NO REPLY NOR EXPLANATION. PLEASE HELP.
item.content:encoded: I ALWAYS FILE MY ANNUAL RETURN SINCE MY BUSINESS NAME WAS REGISTERED BY C A C IN 1990. BUT IN 2021 WHEN CAC DIRECTS ANNUAL RETURN FILING TO BE ONLINE, I HAVE NOT BEEN ABLE TO FILE BECAUSE MY BUSINESS NAME DID NOT SHOW ON CAC PORTAL. I SENT EMAIL THREE TIMES WITH A COPY OF CAC RECEIPT OF ANNUAL RETURN YET NO REPLY NOR EXPLANATION. PLEASE HELP.

item.title: By: Yusuf Odukoya
item.dc:creator: Yusuf Odukoya
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://branditechture.agency/here-is-why-your-business-is-tagged-inactive-on-the-cac-registry/#comment-925">Roe</a>.
Filing of annual returns doesn't begin and end with a link. So, no, I can't.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Roe.

Filing of annual returns doesn’t begin and end with a link. So, no, I can’t.

item.title: By: Roe
item.dc:creator: Roe
item.description: Can you provide a link for us readers to make payments for the annual return to CAC ourselves?
item.content:encoded: Can you provide a link for us readers to make payments for the annual return to CAC ourselves?

item.title: By: Salihu Rafi
item.dc:creator: Salihu Rafi
item.description: <span>Good morning, i just realized this and my business status is showing inactive. Please, i need help with activating it.</span>
item.content:encoded: Good morning, i just realized this and my business status is showing inactive. Please, i need help with activating it.

item.title: By: Yusuf Odukoya
item.dc:creator: Yusuf Odukoya
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://branditechture.agency/here-is-why-your-business-is-tagged-inactive-on-the-cac-registry/#comment-496">Etamuemu Elizabeth</a>.
For your TIN application, you should read this guide; https://branditechture.agency/how-to-get-your-tax-identification-number-tin-in-nigeria-online/
I think I have responded to your message concerning the CAC Inactive issue.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Etamuemu Elizabeth.

For your TIN application, you should read this guide; https://branditechture.agency/how-to-get-your-tax-identification-number-tin-in-nigeria-online/

I think I have responded to your message concerning the CAC Inactive issue.

item.title: By: Etamuemu Elizabeth
item.dc:creator: Etamuemu Elizabeth
item.description: My business name is showing inactive, how can I activate it plus I want to apply for my Tin number
item.content:encoded: My business name is showing inactive, how can I activate it plus I want to apply for my Tin number
